template_input_params.name: LibertyNode01_was_liberty_edition
template_input_params.description: Indicates which Liberty offering should be installed. Valid values are: base, core, nd
template_input_params.label: Liberty Edition to be installed - LibertyNode01

template_input_params.name: LibertyNode01_was_liberty_liberty_servers_server1_keystore_password
template_input_params.description: Liberty keystore password used to protect the Liberty keystore id, this value will be stored in Chef Vault
template_input_params.label: Liberty Keystore password - LibertyNode01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow 8 to 32 printable ASCII characters except space.

template_input_params.name: LibertyNode01_was_liberty_liberty_servers_server1_users_admin_user_name
template_input_params.description: Administrative console username used for accessing the console, the associated password is the admin_user password
template_input_params.label: Liberty administrative user name - LibertyNode01

template_input_params.name: LibertyNode01_was_liberty_liberty_servers_server1_users_admin_user_password
template_input_params.description: Password for the Liberty administrative user name, this value to be stored in the Chef Vault
template_input_params.label: Liberty administrative user name password - LibertyNode01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow 8 to 32 printable ASCII characters except space.

template_input_params.name: LibertyNode01_was_liberty_wlp_user_dir
template_input_params.description: Liberty directory which product configuration will be written
template_input_params.label: Liberty data dir - LibertyNode01

template_input_params.name: LibertyNode01_was_liberty_liberty_servers_server1_feature
template_input_params.description: Lists the Liberty features that should be included in the feature manager list. For example, webProfile-7.0 adminCenter-1.0
template_input_params.label: Liberty features that should be included in the server definition - LibertyNode01

template_input_params.name: LibertyNode01_was_liberty_install_grp
template_input_params.description: Operating system group name that will be assigned to the product installation
template_input_params.label: Liberty group name - LibertyNode01

template_input_params.name: LibertyNode01_was_liberty_install_user
template_input_params.description: Operating system userid that will be used to install the product. Userid will be created if it does not exist
template_input_params.label: Liberty installation userid - LibertyNode01

template_input_params.name: LibertyNode01_was_liberty_liberty_servers_server1_keystore_id
template_input_params.description: Keystore id that will be used when setting up the keyStore attribute in the server.xml
template_input_params.label: Liberty keystore id - LibertyNode01

template_input_params.name: LibertyNode01_was_liberty_runas_user
template_input_params.description: Operating system userid that will be used to run the product. Userid will be created if it does not exist
template_input_params.label: Liberty runas user - LibertyNode01

template_input_params.name: LibertyNode01_was_liberty_liberty_servers_server1_httpport
template_input_params.description: HTTP Transport value that will be set in the defaultHttpEndpoint endpoint in server.xml
template_input_params.label: Liberty server http port - LibertyNode01

template_input_params.name: LibertyNode01_was_liberty_liberty_servers_server1_httpsport
template_input_params.description: Secure HTTP Transport value that will be set in the defaultHttpEndpoint endpoint in server.xml
template_input_params.label: Liberty server https port - LibertyNode01

template_input_params.name: LibertyNode01_was_liberty_liberty_servers_server1_name
template_input_params.description: Name of the initial Liberty server to be created during provisioning
template_input_params.label: Liberty server name - LibertyNode01

template_input_params.name: LibertyNode01_was_liberty_base_version
template_input_params.description: The release and fixpack level for WebSphere Liberty to be installed. Example formats are 8.5.5.11 or 18.0.2
template_input_params.label: Liberty version - LibertyNode01

template_input_params.name: LibertyNode01-flavor
template_input_params.description: LibertyNode01 Flavor
template_input_params.label: LibertyNode01 Flavor

template_input_params.name: LibertyNode01-image
template_input_params.description: Operating system image id / template that should be used when creating the virtual image
template_input_params.label: Operating System ID / Template - LibertyNode01

template_input_params.name: LibertyNode01-os_admin_user
template_input_params.description: Name of the admin user account in the virtual machine that will be accessed via SSH
template_input_params.label: Operating System Username - LibertyNode01

template_input_params.name: LibertyNode01-name
template_input_params.description: Short hostname of virtual machine
template_input_params.label: Short hostname - LibertyNode01

template_input_params.name: runtime_domain
template_input_params.description: Virtual Machine Domain Name
template_input_params.label: Virtual machine Domain Name

template_input_params.name: LibertyNode01-mgmt-network-public
template_input_params.description: Expose and use public IP of virtual machine for internal communication
template_input_params.label: Use Public Management Network

template_input_params.name: LibertyNode01_was_liberty_install_dir
template_input_params.description: The installation root directory for the WebSphere Liberty product binaries
template_input_params.label: WebSphere product installation directory - LibertyNode01

template_input_params.name: ibm_pm_private_ssh_key
template_input_params.description: Private CAMC SSH key (base64 encoded) used to connect to the virtual guest.
template_input_params.label: Private CAMC SSH key (base64 encoded) used to connect to the virtual guest. - ssh_keys

template_input_params.name: ibm_pm_public_ssh_key_name
template_input_params.description: Public CAMC SSH key name used to connect to the virtual guest.
template_input_params.label: Public CAMC SSH key name used to connect to the virtual guest. - ssh_keys

template_input_params.name: user_public_ssh_key
template_input_params.description: User defined public SSH key used to connect to the virtual machine. The format must be in openSSH.
template_input_params.label: User Public SSH Key - ssh_keys

template_input_params.name: LibertyNode01_was_liberty_liberty_servers_server1_users_admin_user_role
template_input_params.description: Liberty role for which administrative users are to be added to, the admin_user will be added to this role by default
template_input_params.label: liberty admin user role - LibertyNode01
